subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The top-seeded Nadal advanced to the semifinals of the Hamburg Open in Germany by beating fifth-seeded Pablo Cuevas, 6-3, 6-2. Nadal’s semifinal opponent will be Andreas Seppi.
snippet: The top-seeded Nadal advanced to the semifinals of the Hamburg Open in Germany by beating fifth-seeded Pablo Cuevas, 6-3, 6-2. Nadal’s semifinal opponent will be Andreas Seppi.
